Name: Alcohol Denat
Notes: Causes drying. Acceptable as a preservative and in  a scalp tonic. Not recommended for sensitive scalp.

Name: Cocamidopropyl Betaine
Notes: May cause allergic reaction. Best to avoid if scalp itches

Name: Isopropyl Alcohol
Notes: Causes drying. Acceptable as a preservative and in  a scalp tonic. Not recommended for sensitive scalp.

Name: Methylchloroisothiazolinone
Notes: Itchy M's alert. May cause allergic reaction - itching and hair loss

Name: Methylisothiazolinone
Notes: Itchy M's alert. May cause allergic reaction - itching and hair loss

Name: Alcohol
Notes: Causes drying. Acceptable as a preservative and in  a scalp tonic. Not recommended for sensitive scalp.
